spacing.title: Spacing
spacing.description: Change the letter spacing over all glyphs at once.

diacriticHeight.title: Diacritic position
diacriticHeight.description: Change the accents position on all diacritic glyphs (é, à, ô, etc.)

opticThickness.title: Capitals thickness
opticThickness.description: This parameter is an optical correction to render capital glyphs in the same way as lowercases — All uppercases.

smallCapDelta.title: Small capitals height
smallCapDelta.description: Change the delta of the small capital height — All small caps.

_scThickness.title: Small capitals thickness
_scThickness.description: This parameter is an optical correction to render the same thickness as lowercases — All small caps.

_scWidth.title: Small capitals width
_scWidth.description: This parameter is an optical correction to render the same width as lowercases — All small caps.

xHeight.title: x-height
xHeight.description: The height of a typeface’s lowercase letters (disregarding ascenders and descenders) — All lowercases.

capDelta.title: Capital height
capDelta.description: The height from the baseline to the top of the uppercase letters — All uppercases.

ascender.title: Ascender
ascender.description: A part of a lowercase letter that rises above the main body of the letter (above the x-height) — b, d, h, etc.

descender.title: Descender
descender.description: A piece of a letter that extends below the baseline — g, j, p, etc.

crossbar.title: Crossbar
crossbar.description: The horizontal stroke across the middle of the letters — A, E, e, etc.

width.title: Width
width.description: Change this parameter to make fonts from condensed to extended ones — All glyphs.

slant.title: Slant
slant.description: Use this parameter to create oblic typefaces — All glyphs.

overshoot.title: overshoot
overshoot.description: This optical correction prevents round letters from appearing smaller than straight letters — O, C, g, n, etc.

thickness.title: Thickness
thickness.description: Use this parameter to create different weights of a typeface — All glyphs.

_contrast.title: Contrast
_contrast.description: This parameter is the difference in stroke width within a letterform; also called stroke modulation.

_contrastExtremity.title: Contrast extremity
_contrastExtremity.description: This parameter is the difference of width in joints.

aperture.title: Aperture
aperture.description: The partially enclosed, somewhat rounded negative space in some glyphs — C, c, n, etc.

apertureTop.title: Aperture top
apertureTop.description: The partially enclosed, somewhat rounded negative space at top in some glyphs — C, c, n, etc.

apertureBottom.title: Aperture bottom
apertureBottom.description: The partially enclosed, somewhat rounded negative space at bottom in some glyphs — C, c, etc.

curviness.title: Curviness
curviness.description: This changes the curviness of each segment of letters, from straight lines to rounded segments. — All glyphs.

serifWidth.title: Serif width
serifWidth.description: Change the lenght of each serifs. This may have no effect if you don't set the height of serifs.

midWidth.title: Serif middle width
midWidth.description: Change the lenght of the bottom of each serifs. This may have no effect if you don't set the height AND width of serifs.

serifHeight.title: Serif height
serifHeight.description: Change the height of each serifs. This may have no effect if you don't set the width of serifs.

serifMedian.title: Serif median
serifMedian.description: Change the height of the extremity of the serif. This may have no effect if you don't set the height of serifs.
